channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-12894] Detect whether ORC is reading from ACID table correctly for Schema Evolution
item.description: Set an configuration variable with 'transactional' property to indicate the table is ACID.
item.summary: Detect whether ORC is reading from ACID table correctly for Schema Evolution

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: This patch included uncommitted changes for HIVE-12887, too.
Rebase. Add a few unit test fixes.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12783485/HIVE-12894.01.patch

SUCCESS: +1 due to 2 test(s) being added or modified.

ERROR: -1 due to 621 failed/errored test(s), 10024 tests executed
Failed tests:

TestHWISessionManager - did not produce a TEST-*.xml file

ATTACHMENT ID: 12784011 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build

Does this need to be documented in the wiki?

HIVE_SCHEMA_EVOLUTION("hive.exec.schema.evolution", false,
"Use schema evolution to convert self-describing file format's data to the schema desired by the reader."),

HIVE_TRANSACTIONAL_TABLE_SCAN("hive.transactional.table.scan", false,
"Do transaction (ACID) table scan."),

HIVESAMPLERANDOMNUM("hive.sample.seednumber", 0,
"A number used to percentage sampling. By changing this number, user will change the subsets of data sampled."),

No, but thanks for asking Andrew.

hive.transactional.table.scan is internal only, so it shouldn't be documented in the wiki.

The other two weren't changed by this patch. hive.sample.seednumber is already documented, and hive.exec.schema.evolution will be documented for HIVE-11981, HIVE-12625, and HIVE-12799.
HIVE-12906 backported this to branch-1 for release 1.3.0. (I'm not sure whether 1.3.0 should be included in Fix Version/s for this issue as well as HIVE-12906.)
Added 2.0.1 to Fix Version. Working on committing it.
